casebody.data:
STATE
v.
WALKER, BROWNING & HERNANDEZ. No. 16P05-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 26, 2005. Brian Michael Aus, for Emil E. Browning, Jr. Daniel L. Pollitt, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Jason Christopher Walker. Geoffrey W. Hosford, Wilmington, for Javier A. Hernandez, Jr. Seth Edwards, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th day of August 2005 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

*527"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of August 2005."
